code: import{jwtDecode}from'jwt-decode';const checkTokenValidity=webToken=>{try{const decodedWT=jwtDecode(webToken);const currentTime=Date.now()/1000;return decodedWT.exp>currentTime;}catch(error){return false;}};export const isWebTokenValid=()=>{const token=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('webToken'));return checkTokenValidity(token);};
